test-case.name: cbcl-gMonth-equal-001
test-case.description: test comparison of gMonth
test-case.test: declare function local:gMonth($month as xs:integer) { if ($month lt 10) then xs:gMonth(concat("--0", $month)) else xs:gMonth(concat("--", $month)) }; not(local:gMonth(1) eq xs:gMonth("--06"))

test-case.description: test comparison of gMonth

test-case.name: cbcl-gMonth-equal-006
test-case.description: test comparison of gMonth
test-case.test: declare function local:gMonth($month as xs:integer) { if ($month lt 10) then xs:gMonth(concat("--0", $month)) else xs:gMonth(concat("--", $month)) }; not(local:gMonth(1) ne xs:gMonth("--06"))

test-case.name: cbcl-gMonth-equal-011
test-case.description: test comparison of gMonth
test-case.test: declare function local:gMonth($gMonth as xs:gMonth, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $gMonth }; exists(local:gMonth(xs:gMonth("--12"), fn:true()) eq xs:gMonth("--12"))

test-case.name: cbcl-gMonth-equal-012
test-case.description: test comparison of gMonth
test-case.test: declare function local:gMonth($gMonth as xs:gMonth, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $gMonth }; local:gMonth(xs:gMonth("--12"), fn:false()) eq xs:gMonth("--12")

test-case.name: cbcl-gMonth-equal-013
test-case.description: test comparison of gMonth
test-case.test: declare function local:gMonth($gMonth as xs:gMonth, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $gMonth }; exists(local:gMonth(xs:gMonth("--12"), fn:true()) ne xs:gMonth("--12"))

test-case.name: cbcl-gMonth-equal-014
test-case.description: test comparison of gMonth
test-case.test: declare function local:gMonth($gMonth as xs:gMonth, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $gMonth }; local:gMonth(xs:gMonth("--12"), fn:false()) ne xs:gMonth("--12")
